author: AdrianoDee
body:
#### PR description:

Moving from Tracking Reco Geometry to Digi Geometry. As it is the `TrackerGeometry` object isn't found in the `TrackerRecoGeometryRecord`.

Discussion [here](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/30817#discussion_r456797671)

#### PR validation:

runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all --ibeos

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Backport of [30989](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/30989)

Needed for HLT MC samples production.
title: Moving to Digi Geometry
